sections.heading: per pupil cost of the service agency, defined
sections.text: Average per pupil cost of the service agency means the amount computed by dividing the total operating expenditure of the preceding year, excluding the cost of sectarian instruction, of the service agency by its preceding year's average daily membership.

79-1116.Average per pupil cost of the service agency, defined.

Average per pupil cost of the service agency means the amount computed by dividing the total operating expenditure of the preceding year, excluding the cost of sectarian instruction, of the service agency by its preceding year's average daily membership.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 367, ยง 6;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-3306;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 798;Laws 1997, LB 346, ยง 10.
